Distro: bluewhite64 (slackware x86_64)

Apache 2.2.3 compiled with:

$ export CPPFLAGS="-I/usr/include/openssl -I/usr/include/nptl"
$ export CFLAGS="-g -O3 -ffast-math"
$ ./configure --enable-usertrack --enable-so --enable-rewrite \
--disable-suexec --disable-userdir --disable-dav --disable-dav-fs
--disable-dav-lock \
--enable-info --enable-deflate --enable-ssl --enable-headers --enable-expires \
--with-pcre=/usr --with-z=/usr \
--enable-mime-magic --enable-mem-cache \
--enable-disk-cache --enable-cache --enable-file-cache \
--enable-unique-id --with-mpm=worker --enable-logio \
--prefix=/usr/local/apache
$ make
# make install

$ ./configure \
--with-apxs2=/usr/local/apache/bin/apxs \

--prefix=/usr/local/apache/php
